alert.note: Alert for Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 9:27PM EDT until July 26 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN VENANGO...NORTHEASTERN BUTLER AND NORTHWESTERN CLARION COUNTIES... At 927 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Knox, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Knox, Parker, Sligo, Emlenton, Clintonville, Shippenville, St. Petersburg, Eau Claire, Kennerdell, Callensburg, Barkeyville, Foxburg, Cherry Valley, Boyers, and Cranberry Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
